meanings.definition: To operate a telephone by dialing a number.
meanings.sent1: She dialed her friend's number to chat.
meanings.sent2: He dialed the emergency services when he saw the accident.
meanings.sent3: The cat dialed the wrong number while playing with the phone.
meanings.sent4: His heart dialed the number of excitement when he heard the good news.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the dialing phone echoed in the empty room.

meanings.definition: To select or choose something by turning a dial or similar mechanism.
meanings.sent1: He dialed the radio to his favorite station.
meanings.sent2: She dialed the thermostat to a comfortable temperature.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally dialed the oven to the highest setting.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition dialed the right decision in a moment of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The student carefully dialed the combination to open the lock.

meanings.definition: To adjust or calibrate a device by turning a dial or similar mechanism.
meanings.sent1: He dialed the telescope to focus on the distant star.
meanings.sent2: She dialed the microscope to see the tiny details clearly.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic dialed the machine to the precise measurement.
meanings.sent4: His creativity dialed the design to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The musician dialed the guitar to produce the perfect sound.
